synthesis_method: The electrolyte synthesis process involves preparing a binary Co-doped S-Ag-Ge ore type solid electrolyte by mixing lithium sulfide (Li2S), phosphorus pentasulfide (P2S5), and lithium halide (LiX), grinding the mixture to obtain a stoichiometric ratio of Li6-xPS5-xX1+x, adding doping raw materials, uniformly grinding again, sintering the powder, keeping it warm, cooling, and grinding to achieve the final solid electrolyte powder.
